page.title: 16Life in Watford Mrs Richards
page.content: We interviewed Mrs. Richards who is a local inhabitant. She works in Holy Rood School. She has lived in this area for nearly 18 years and she is our School Secretary. Mrs Richards told us it is a busy but friendly area. All our houses were built at the same time 18 years ago and the people all moved in at the same time. Local shops cover most needs but people go to Watford for their main shopping. There are no leisure facilities near to Holy Rood School so people go to the Watford Leisure Centre at Woodside. The M25 has brought more traffic to this area but the residents are not bothered about the noise. Mrs Richards said,"This is a good place to live, friendly and not too near the main town."
